Package marytts.htsengine

Class Summary
CartTreeSet Set of CART trees used in HMM synthesis.
GVModelSet Set of Global Mean and (diagonal) Variance for log f0, mel-cepstrum, bandpass voicing strengths and Fourier magnitudes (the signal processing part of Fourier magnitudes is not implemented yet).
HMMData Configuration files and global variables for HTS engine.
HMMVoice  
HTSDWin Windows used to calculate dynamic features, delta and delta-delta.
HTSEngineTest Several functions for running the htsEngine or other components stand alone
HTSModel HMM model for a particular phone (or line in context feature file) This model is the unit when building a utterance model sequence.
HTSParameterGeneration Parameter generation out of trained HMMs.
HTSPStream Data type and procedures used in parameter generation.
HTSUttModel list of Model objects for current utterance.
HTSVocoder Synthesis of speech out of speech parameters.
PhoneTranslator Translates phone names used in HTS-HTK
